p: At present, more than twenty FIPs have been isolated or synthesized since the first FIP, LingZhi-8 (LZ-8 or FIP-glu), was isolated in 1989 ( 26). The FIPs from different origins not only share high homology in nucleotides and amino acid sequences, but also show significant similarity in immunomodulation and anti-tumor activities ( 6, 42).
